2.1.5.1.1. modopt.plot.cost_plot module¶

PLOTTING ROUTINES

This module contains methods for making plots.

Author:Samuel Farrens <samuel.farrens@gmail.com>
Version:1.1
Date:05/01/2017
modopt.plot.cost_plot.plotCost(cost_list, output=None)[source]¶

Plot cost function

Plot the final cost function

Parameters:
  • cost_list (list) – List of cost function values
  • output (str, optional) – Output file name
